#nullable enable
namespace TestApp;
public partial class Person
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Creates a new instance with <see cref="Name"/> set to the specified value.
    /// </summary>
    public Person WithName(string value)
    {
        return new Person
        {
            Name = value,
            Age = this.Age,
        };
    }


    /// <summary>
    /// Creates a new instance with <see cref="Age"/> set to the specified value.
    /// </summary>
    public Person WithAge(int value)
    {
        return new Person
        {
            Name = this.Name,
            Age = value,
        };
    }
}
